const fontFamily = "'Porsche Next','Arial Narrow',Arial,'Heiti SC',SimHei,sans-serif";

export { fontFamily };

export declare const breakpoints: readonly ["base", "xs", "s", "m", "l", "xl", "xxl"];
export type Breakpoint = (typeof breakpoints)[number];

import type { Breakpoint } from './breakpointShared';
export type BKey<K extends Breakpoint> = Extract<Breakpoint, K>;

import type { ThemeColorSet } from './themeShared';

import type { ThemeColorSet } from './themeShared';
export declare const themeLight: ThemeColorSet;
